glsa.title: star: Suid root vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: star contains a suid root vulnerability which could potentially grant unauthorized root access to an attacker.

background.p: star is an enhanced tape archiver, much like tar, that is recognized for it's speed as well as it's enhanced mt/rmt support.

description.p: A suid root vulnerability exists in versions of star that are configured to use ssh for remote tape access.

impact.p: Attackers with local user level access could potentially gain root level access.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All star users should upgrade to the latest version:
